description: Episode of Series "Full of Life". This program looks at the various things that affect our skin. Topics covered include the structure of the skin, the purpose of the skin and the things that influence the state of our skins such as diet, hygiene, age and sun. This program aims to encourage young people to adopt a healthy, balanced way of living. Rated: G.
